message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I think would be perfect for you!  I'm asking for $17,000 for it, which I think is a fair price considering its value.  Let me know what you think!
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.

Bob, I appreciate your interest!  While $12,000 is lower than I was hoping for, I'm willing to come down to $16,000.  This is still a great deal for you, and it's closer to the value I'm looking for. Let's see if we can find common ground.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $16,000, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $14,000 for the product.

Bob, I understand you're on a budget, but $14,000 just doesn't work for me. I'm willing to compromise and come down to $15,500. This is a great deal for you, and it's the lowest I can go. Let's close this deal!

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm afraid $15,500 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you at $12,000, which is the maximum I'm willing to pay. I'm hoping we can finalize the deal at this price.
